T02D1483:130a-1: sapta aa ksha ra s'a dha na /
T02D1483:130a-3: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1483:130a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1483:130b-0: kun du rtog pa yongs su spangs pa'i chos skur @130b gang gsungs dang //
T02D1483:130b-1: dpe med bde ba rtsal gyis mdzes pa longs spyod rdzogs sku dang //
T02D1483:130b-2: gang gi gnas la phan par mdzad pa las ni sprul pa'i sku //
T02D1483:130b-3: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' de yis khyed la
T02D1483:130b-4: bde legs shog / gang gi phyag na kha tv'am
T02D1483:130b-5: ga dang da ma rus ni cher sgrogs pa yis
T02D1483:130b-6: gar mdzad gang // 'jig rten gsum pa 'gul bzhin
T02D1483:130b-7: pa yis ri yi rtse mo bskyod pas chu yi
T02D1483:130b-8: gar mdzad gang // phung po 'khrugs // mdzes pa'i
T02D1483:130b-9: spyan dang zhal rnams mnga' bas zhabs mnan rgya mtsho
T02D1483:130b-10: nang gi sa ni dmar gyur pa //
T02D1483:130b-11: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs ldan dpal ldan khrag 'thung
T02D1483:130b-12: 'di de sa stengs rtag tu rgyal gyur cig /
T02D1483:130b-13: zhal gsum phyag drug sngon po la //
T02D1483:130b-14: rang snang shes rab lus 'jar ba //
T02D1483:130b-15: h'um skyes lha mo drug gi mgon //
T02D1483:130b-16: btud nas sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D1483:130b-17: rnal 'byor pa snga bar langs la /
T02D1483:130b-18: dam tshig gi ril bu khar bcug nas /
T02D1483:130b-19: ri bo dang tshang tshing la sogs nyams dga' ba'i
T02D1483:130b-20: gnas su sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug ste
T02D1483:130b-21: / snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D1483:130b-22: h'um sngon po bltas la yi ge h'um de las
T02D1483:130b-23: 'od zer rnam pa lnga nam mkha'i khongs su khams
T02D1483:130b-24: gsum pa mngon par khyab par kun nas spros te
T02D1483:130b-25: / / 'od zer de rnams kyis 'og min gyi
T02D1483:130b-26: gnas na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'chad bzhin pa'i
T02D1483:130b-27: mdog dang phyag dang mtshon cha dang /
T02D1483:130b-28: rnal 'byor ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1483:130b-29: dpa' thams cad til gyi gang bu lta bu spyan
T02D1483:130b-30: drangs nas / nam mkha'i phyogs su mdun du yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D1483:130b-31: 'od zer de rnams kyang rang gi sa bon la bsdu'o //
T02D1483:130b-32: de nas rang gi sa bon las yang dag par spros pa'i phyi dang /
T02D1483:130b-35: de nyid mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis /
T02D1483:130b-36: bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02D1483:130b-37: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1483:130b-38: rnams cho ga ji lta bar mchod par bya zhing
T02D1483:130b-39: phyag 'tshal lo // de nas de rnams kyi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1483:130b-40: sdig pa mi bya ba'i phyir bsdam pa dang /
T02D1483:130b-41: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1483:130b-42: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D1483:131a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1483:131a-3: bdag gis dngos po dbul ba dang /
T02D1483:131a-5: gsol ba gdab ba byas nas /
T02D1483:131a-6: de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom mo //
T02D1483:131a-7: de nas chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1483:131a-8: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1483:131a-9: zhes bya ba dngos po ma lus pa'i de kho
T02D1483:131a-10: na nyid sdud par byed pa'i sngags kyi de kho
T02D1483:131a-12: de ma skyes ma 'gags pa 'od gsal ba'i ting
T02D1483:131a-13: nge 'dzin la yud tsam rab tu mi gnas pa'i
T02D1483:131a-14: ngo bor yang dag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1483:131a-15: de nas sngar gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis nus pas 'od gsal ba'i gnas las langs la /
T02D1483:131a-16: rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bu sna tshogs la blta zhing /
T02D1483:131a-17: 'gro ba'i don du bdag nyid dpal he ru ka nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1483:131a-18: yam ram bam lam yongs su gyur pa las gzhu
T02D1483:131a-19: dang zur gsum pa dang zlum po dang gru bzhi
T02D1483:131a-20: pa sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang
T02D1483:131a-21: ser po 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gong nas gong
T02D1483:131a-22: du blta'o // de'i steng du yi ge sum las
T02D1483:131a-23: byung ba'i ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che
T02D1483:131a-24: sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rtse mo brgyad kyis nye
T02D1483:131a-25: du blta'o // bar mdzes pa'o // de'i steng du
T02D1483:131a-26: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um
T02D1483:131a-27: du blta'o // bar mdzes pa'o // / aom badzra br'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1483:131a-28: aom badzra pa nydza ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1483:131a-29: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1483:131a-30: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram /
T02D1483:131a-31: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a aa na l'a rka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1483:131a-32: sngags kyi tshig de dag gis rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug byas la /
T02D1483:131a-33: de'i nang grub bzhi la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1483:131a-34: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i 'khor
T02D1483:131a-35: lo rtsibs drug pa rdo rje dang padma 'khor lo'i
T02D1483:131a-36: phreng bas yongs su bskor bar bsam mo //
T02D1483:131a-37: de'i nang du padma'i lte ba la gnas pa /
T02D1483:131a-38: ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1483:131a-39: aa tshar dang ka tshar yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1483:131a-40: zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyar ba'i dbus na
T02D1483:131a-41: gnas pa'i yi ge h'um sngon po rdo rje sems
T02D1483:131a-42: dpa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bsgom mo //
T02D1483:131a-43: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur ba las bcom
T02D1483:131a-44: ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro h'um las byung ba
T02D1483:131a-45: phag mo la 'khyud pa bde ba chen po man
T02D1483:131a-46: ngag ji lta ba bzhin du me long lta bu
T02D1483:131a-47: la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid /
T02D1483:131b-0: phyag drug pa zhal @131b gsum pa /
T02D1483:131b-1: rtsa ba dang g-yas dang g-yon po ser po dang ljang gu /
T02D1483:131b-2: spyan gsum pa khyab bdag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1483:131b-3: dang dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid can 'khyud pa'i
T02D1483:131b-4: phyag dag gis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa
T02D1483:131b-5: / phyag cig shos dag gis steng nas mi'i pags pa 'phyang ba /
T02D1483:131b-6: phyag g-yon na kha tv'am ga brten pa dang thod pa khrag gis gang ba can /
T02D1483:131b-7: g-yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1483:131b-9: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par klubs pa /
T02D1483:131b-10: rked par stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol ba /
T02D1483:131b-11: ral pa'i tshogs sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa ste /
T02D1483:131b-12: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i
T02D1483:131b-13: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1483:131b-14: 'jigs byed dang / dus mtshan mo'i mgo bo'i rna
T02D1483:131b-15: ba g-yon pa dang nu ma g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs
T02D1483:131b-17: mgon po ji lta ba de bzhin du rdo rje
T02D1483:131b-18: phag mo'i mdog dang phyag la sogs pa yin no
T02D1483:131b-19: // 'on kyang mi'i pags pa spangs nas phyag de dag gis mda' dang zhu 'chang bas te /
T02D1483:131b-20: lha mo ni bcom ldan 'das la bus mo gnyis
T02D1483:131b-21: kun nas 'khyud de mchog tu dga' bas myos par
T02D1483:131b-22: bsam mo // de nas rtsibs drug po dag la yang g-yon skor du lha mo drug blta'o //
T02D1483:131b-23: de la shar gyi rtsibs la yi ge phat las
T02D1483:131b-24: byung ba dang po lha mo dpal khrag 'thung ma
T02D1483:131b-25: mdog sngon mo / rtsibs gzhan la yi ge h'um
T02D1483:131b-26: las byung ba gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma
T02D1483:131b-27: mdog sngon mo / mdog ser mo / rtsibs gzhan
T02D1483:131b-28: la yi ge ha las skyes pa gsum pa gtum
T02D1483:131b-30: rtsibs gzhan la yi ge ha las byung ba rdo rje sna phyed ma ljang gu ;
T02D1483:131b-31: rtsibs gzhan la yi ge hri: las yang dag par
T02D1483:131b-32: skyes pa lnga pa rdo rje drag mo du ba'i
T02D1483:131b-33: mdog / rtsibs gzhan la yi ge aom las grub
T02D1483:131b-34: pa drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma mdog dkar
T02D1483:131b-35: mo'o // lha mo de dag zhal gcig ma phyag
T02D1483:131b-36: bzhi ma gnyis kyi sa da ma ru dang dril
T02D1483:131b-38: de las gzhan pa dag gis mi'i pags pa steng nas 'dzin pa /
T02D1483:131b-39: thams cad drag mo chen mo spyan gsum ma /
T02D1483:131b-41: phyogs kyi gos can yi dags dang nyi ma'i steng na gnas pa /
T02D1483:131b-42: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can /
T02D1483:131b-43: g-yon brkyang bas gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D1483:132a-2: dngos grub nye bar mdzad ma rnams bsam mo //
T02D1483:132a-3: de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das kyi snying ga'i sa
T02D1483:132a-4: bon las rnam par byung ba'i 'od zer rnams dang
T02D1483:132a-5: / yi ge dza: yis ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug cing /
T02D1483:132a-6: yi ge h'um gis dam tshig gi 'khor lor chu la chu bzhin du gzhug ste /
T02D1483:132a-7: yi ge bam gyis 'ching ba dang /
T02D1483:132a-8: yi ge ho: yis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1483:132a-9: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon bsams nas /
T02D1483:132a-10: lam mam bam tam kham zhes bya ba rnams kyis khams lnga byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1483:132a-11: yi ge aom a'am hri ho h'um hi rnams kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1483:132a-12: yi ge bh'um h'um kham aa ham he rnams kyis skye mched rnams sbyang ngo //
T02D1483:132a-13: de nas lha drug gi bdag nyid kyi go cha rnams kyis bdag nyid bgo ste //
T02D1483:132a-15: na ma hi mgo bo la /
T02D1483:132a-16: sv'a h'a tu spyi gtsug tu /
T02D1483:132a-17: boo shata he phrag pa gnyis la /
T02D1483:132a-18: h'um h'um ho mig dag la /
T02D1483:132a-19: phat ham yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o //
T02D1483:132a-20: lha mo drug gi dag pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma go bgo ste /
T02D1483:132a-26: phat phat yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o //
T02D1483:132a-27: de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku dang gsung
T02D1483:132a-28: dang thugs kyi lam dag la aom a'a: h'um dgod
T02D1483:132a-29: do // de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1483:132a-30: las rnam par byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bskul
T02D1483:132a-31: te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug la /
T02D1483:132a-32: dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab ste /
T02D1483:132a-33: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur ba stsal du gsol zhes so //
T02D1483:132a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i
T02D1483:132a-35: gzugs du ma la sogs pas bdud rtsi ldas bkang
T02D1483:132a-36: pa'i bum pa lag na thogs pa dbang bskur pa'i
T02D1483:132a-38: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D1483:132a-39: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1483:132a-40: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1483:132a-41: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba sbyin //
T02D1483:132a-42: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1483:132a-43: sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes brjod nas dbang
T02D1483:132a-44: bskur ba na sems kyi dbang bdag cod pan du
T02D1483:132a-45: gyur par bya'o // zhe sdang dang phra ma dang
T02D1483:132a-46: phrag dog dang 'dod chags dang gti mug dang chos
T02D1483:132a-47: kyi dbyings kyi cod pan rnams lha mo rnams la
T02D1483:132a-48: rim pa ji lta bar 'khrung ba zhes bsam mo
T02D1483:132b-0: gyur par bya'o // // yi ge h'um las @132b skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1483:132b-1: lha mo la yi ge ae las skyes pa'i padma 'dab ma gsum par /
T02D1483:132b-2: aa las skyes pa'i snying po /
T02D1483:132b-3: aom las skyes pa'i ze'u 'bru bsgom mo //
T02D1483:132b-4: rdo rje lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis drangs
T02D1483:132b-5: pa'i padma'i sna rtser myos byed shin tu myos par
T02D1483:132b-6: rjes su chags par bya ste /
T02D1483:132b-7: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1483:132b-8: zhes bya ba'i sgra rnams kyis bskul la de bzhin
T02D1483:132b-9: gshegs pa thams cad zhugs te rjes su chags par
T02D1483:132b-10: byas nas snying gar zhu bar byas la /
T02D1483:132b-11: rdo rje'i lam nas padma'i lte bar spro bar bya'o //
T02D1483:132b-12: mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug pa ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo'i mtshams rnams kun nas spros la /
T02D1483:132b-13: cho ga bzhin du mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D1483:132b-14: aom shr'i he ru ka aa rgham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1483:132b-15: aom shr'i he ru ka p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1483:132b-16: aom shr'i he ru ka aa nytsha ma nam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1483:132b-17: phyi nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dri rnams dang
T02D1483:132b-18: me tog rnams kyis mchod par bya zhing bstod par
T02D1483:132b-19: bya'o // de nas bdud rtsi myang ba bsam par bya ste /
T02D1483:132b-20: yi ge yam yongs su gyur ba las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D1483:132b-21: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1483:132b-22: de'i steng du mgo po gsum la gnas pa yi ge aa dmar po las skyes pa padma'i snod /
T02D1483:132b-23: de'i dbus su hr'um tr'am dzr'im kham h'um lam mam
T02D1483:132b-24: bam tam de dag yongs su gyur bas bdud rtsi
T02D1483:132b-25: lnga dang sgron ma lnga rang rang gis bon gyis
T02D1483:132b-26: mtshan pa de'i kha chod kyi ge aom de'i steng
T02D1483:132b-27: du yi ge a'a: las skyes pa'i ri bong can
T02D1483:132b-28: / de la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bon des mtshan pa'i //
T02D1483:132b-29: rlung gis me sbar te skyes pas dag pa dang /
T02D1483:132b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yi ge aom
T02D1483:132b-31: dang zla ba dang rdo rje rnams zhu bar gyur
T02D1483:132b-32: nas thod pa der lhung ba dang /
T02D1483:132b-33: de las aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod la /
T02D1483:132b-34: lha thams cad kyi bdud rtsi bkug nas de nyid du gzhug go //
T02D1483:132b-35: 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs la lce'i rtse mor
T02D1483:132b-36: h'um las byung ba nas kyi 'bras bu'i tshad rdo
T02D1483:132b-38: rdo rje'i sbu gus bdud rtsi de myang bar bya'o //
T02D1483:132b-39: bcom ldan 'das dang lha mo'i tshogs la zhal du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1483:132b-40: de nas bsam gtan gyis skyon bde mchog gi nga rgyal 'chang zhing sngags bzlas te /
T02D1483:132b-42: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1483:132b-43: bzlas pas skyon dag pa dran par bya /
T02D1483:133a-1: pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1483:133a-2: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal khrag 'thung ma'o //
T02D1483:133a-3: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02D1483:133a-4: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o //
T02D1483:133a-5: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o //
T02D1483:133a-6: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1483:133a-7: mgul chu dang gdu gu dang dpung rgyan dang gdub
T02D1483:133a-8: kor dang thal ba dang skud pa rnams ni pha
T02D1483:133a-9: rol tu phyin pa drug rnams par dag par rtogs
T02D1483:133a-10: par bya'o // gtor ma nye bar sbyor ba sngon
T02D1483:133a-11: du 'gro bar thun gsum du bcom ldan 'das bsam
T02D1483:133a-12: par bya'o // par bya'o // de la 'di ni gtor ma'i rim pa yin te /
T02D1483:133a-13: rnal 'byor g-yas brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D1483:133a-14: gnas mthon po la brten zhing kha ltor bltas pa
T02D1483:133a-15: gcer bu skra bshig pas nam phyed na rkang pa
T02D1483:133a-16: mnan cing gyen du blta ba /
T02D1483:133a-17: gyen du phem zhes sgrogs pas 'bar ba'i phyag rgya
T02D1483:133a-18: byas nas bskor zhing bskor bas dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1483:133a-20: de'i rjes la rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye ba byas nas /
T02D1483:133a-21: aom a'a: badzra aa ra lli ho dza: h'um bam
T02D1483:133a-22: ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri
T02D1483:133a-23: shya ya ho: de ltar lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi
T02D1483:133a-26: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'a
T02D1483:133a-27: ksha sam bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunm'a
T02D1483:133a-28: da / aa pa sma ra d'a ki n+ya da ya /
T02D1483:133a-29: ai mam ba mim gri hnam tu /
T02D1483:133a-36: dzi ghra tha m'a ti kra ma tha /
T02D1483:133a-37: ma ma sarbba k'a rta ya /
T02D1483:133a-39: sa ha yi k'a bha bantu h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1483:133a-40: zhes bya ba 'dis gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1483:133a-41: gtor ma byin nas ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba byas nas /
T02D1483:133a-42: rnal 'byor pas dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi /
T02D1483:133a-43: gzugs kyi dbang po'i spyod yul du snang ba'i rnam
T02D1483:133a-44: pa ma bzlog par 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur
T02D1483:133a-45: mos shing ci ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D1483:133a-46: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs gang //
T02D1483:133a-47: gnyis med gnyis su med pas byas //
T02D1483:133a-48: dge ba thob pa gang yin des //
T02D1483:133a-49: 'jig rten 'khor lo sdom par shog / yi ge
T02D1483:133a-50: bdun pa'i sgrub thabs pandi ta gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1483:133a-51: rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1483:133b-0: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba @133b mkhas pa mar
